attributes.action: Require covid test 72 hours ahead of all travel to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: The continued rise in cases, mutations to the virus, and similar regulations around the world will stand to mitigate any risk of importing cases. With the added benefit that for some people it will reduce travel anxiety where travel is possible or nessesary.
attributes.background: Travelers entering the UK must submit negative covid test results taken no longer than 72 hours before entering the UK or boarding planes or vessels bound for the UK.
